pageContext.claim: “The inspector general's shocking report proved that the Obama FBI obtained secret warrants to spy on my campaign based on a phony foreign dossier of debunk smears paid for by crooked Hillary Clinton and the DNC.”
pageContext.analysis: A secret surveillance warrant was obtained on Trump foreign policy adviser Carter Page, who had already left the campaign at the time the FISA application was approved. It was renewed three times. The IG found numerous errors in the application and that the Christopher Steele dossier was a key source for one section -- Carter Page's alleged coordination with the Russian government on 2016 U.S. presidential election activities. The FBI did not act with political bias when it applied for the surveillance warrant on Page, the IG found.
